item.title: Report X-2024081495
item.description:
Report X-2024081495

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED ON THE IRREGULAR BELT. RESPONDER NOTICED THE OUTER WALL OF BOX INDICATED IT WAS EITHER LEAKING FROM WITHIN OR LEAKED ON BY AN OUTSIDE SOURCE. RESPONDER HAD PPE ON AND BROUGHT THE BOX TO THE PSC. UPON OPENING THE BOX, IT WAS DETERMINED THE "WICKED FOAM N'FRESH" WAS THE SOURCE. DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON HAZARDOUS LEAKER; NO LEAK TO NAIL PRODUCTS. THE (3) NAIL PRODUCTS ARE ACETONE FREE BUT CONTAIN HIGHLY FLAMMABLE ISOBUTYL NITRATE. BOTTLES LABELED FLAMMABLE / HIGHLY FLAMMABLE. REQUESTED SAFETY DATA SHEETS SEVERAL TIMES BUT DID NOT RECEIVE THEM FROM THE SHIPPER.

  • Description: RIPPED BAG FOUND BY PD-5 UNDERSLIDE. INSPECTION DURING REPACKING/RETAPING REVEALED IT CONTAINED FIRE EXTINGUISHERS AND NO DIAMOND HAZARD LABELS. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROTOCOL FOLLOWED. REWRAP; NO LEAK.

item.title: Report X-2024081395
item.description:
Report X-2024081395

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKER IN UNLOAD, WHICH TURNED OUT TO BE SOUP BASE. UPON INSPECTION OF AN AFFECTED PACKAGE, DISCOVERED 3 AEROSOL CANS INSIDE, WITH NO LIMITED QUANTITY WARNING STICKER. UPS PROTOCOL FOR A POTENTIALLY UNDECLARED HAZMAT WAS INITIATED.

item.title: Report X-2024081252
item.description:
Report X-2024081252

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-21T15:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-08
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND ON THE WEST IRREG BELT ON THE BALL MATT WHEN A CALL WAS MADE TO THE PSC FOR CLEAN UP. DESIGNATED RESPONDER WENT TO THE CALL FOLLOWED THE SMALL PACKAGE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. DESIGNATED RESPONDER DONNED PPE CLEANED UP SPILL AND BROUGHT PACKAGE AND RELATED DEBRIS BACK TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver arrived at generator site to pick up roll off bin loaded with Haz Waste. driver incorrectly attempted to load roll off onto trailer, during the loading process, the bin slipped off of the trailer resulting in a puncture in the steel side of the bin releasing material. Spill was cleaned up in house and minimal amount of soil was remediated. No storm drains were impacted.

item.title: Report X-2024080901
item.description:
Report X-2024080901

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-20T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-02
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A SPILL ON SD1 AT DOOR 193. THEY DONNED PPE, USED THE DECISION-TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. HAZMAT LEAKER WAS A PH 13. THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL, CONTAINERIZED AND BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR PROCESSING. HAZMAT LEAKER WAS ASSIGNED TO ME. PROCESSING AS A DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024080774
item.description:
Report X-2024080774

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-20T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-02
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 12.5 OUNCE AEROSOL CAN OF FLAMMABLE LYSOL DISINFECTANT SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM OREGON USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER X2X012, NOAA/OMAO/MOC-P/OSCAR DYSON, 2002 SE MARINE SCIENCE DR, NEWPORT OR 97365-5300.

item.title: Report E-2024080358
item.description:
Report E-2024080358

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-31
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 31, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1993 was damaged by a skid and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from North West Hazmat (NWH) to remediate the impacted site. NWH personnel deployed absorbent pads to the UN1993-impacted trailer and transferred all product to a new 55-gallon drum. Absorbent pads were placed below the damaged drum, and it was transported back to the terminal as salvaged product along with the new 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report X-2024080988
item.description:
Report X-2024080988

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) RECEIVED A REQUEST TO RETRIEVE A LEAKING PACKAGE. DR RETRIEVED SEVERAL AFFECTED AND LEAKING PACKAGES AND BROUGHT THEM BACK TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER (PSC). UPON TRIAGING THE PACKAGES, DR DISCOVERED THIS PACKAGE CONTAINED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS. DR CHECKED OUTER BOX, BUT OUTER BOX DID NOT SHOW ANY HAZARDOUS MARKINGS. RESPONSIBLE MANAGEMENT PERSON (RMP) CONTACTED THE UPS HAZARDOUS MATERIALS SERVICE CENTER REGARDING THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND CONFIRMED THAT THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS CONSIDERED UNDECLARED.
